medical_history.chief_complaint: One week history of malaise and non-specific abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began one week ago, starting in the right lower quadrant and progressing to the mid abdomen. Patient has decreased appetite and experienced a loose bowel movement today, prompting the visit to the emergency department.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Coronary artery disease status post anterior wall myocardial infarction. 2. History of esophageal spasm.
medical_history.family_history: No history of coronary artery disease.
